name: Mushroom Sauce Baked Pork Chops
author: JHILGENB
summary: The easiest pork chop recipe imaginable, and oh so tasty.  My family has passed this recipe down for years.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Rub pork chops with salt, pepper, and garlic powder
Melt butter in a skillet over medium-high heat, add chops, and brown on both sides
Place onions in skillet, and cook until browned
Pour in mushroom soup and milk; stir until blended
Remove from heat, and set aside
Arrange sliced potatoes evenly in prepared baking dish
Arrange chops on top of potatoes
Bake, covered, for 30 minutes in the preheated oven
Uncover, and bake 30 minutes more, or until potatoes are tender
